Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
Deprecated Methods
oracle.adf.controller.ViewPortContext.createSavePoint()
          use SavePointManager.createSavePoint(SavePointAttributes, boolean) 
oracle.adf.controller.savepoint.SavePointManager.createSavePoint(SavePointAttributes, boolean)
          use SavePointManager.createSavePoint() or SavePointManager.createSavePoint(SavePointAttributes) 
oracle.adf.controller.ViewPortContext.createSavePoint(String, SavePointAttributes)
          use SavePointManager.createSavePoint(SavePointAttributes, boolean) Custom save point ids are no longer supported. 
oracle.adf.controller.config.ControllerConfig.getCurrent()
          use ControllerConfig.getCurrent(boolean) 
oracle.adf.controller.metadata.MetadataService.getMutableMetadataResource(String, boolean, boolean)
          Replaced in 11.1.1.6.2 by MetadataService.getMutableMetadataResource(String, boolean, boolean, boolean) 
oracle.adf.controller.metadata.provider.MetadataResourceProvider.getMutableResource(String, boolean, boolean)
          Replaced in 11.1.1.6.2 by MetadataResourceProvider.getMutableResource(String, boolean, boolean, boolean) 
oracle.adf.controller.metadata.provider.ReadOnlyMetadataResourceProvider.getMutableResource(String, boolean, boolean)
           
oracle.adf.controller.metadata.provider.MetadataResourceProvider.getMutableResource(String, boolean, boolean, boolean)
          Replaced in 12.1.3.0.0 by MetadataResourceProvider.getMetadataResources(ParsingConfig) 
oracle.adf.controller.metadata.provider.ReadOnlyMetadataResourceProvider.getMutableResource(String, boolean, boolean, boolean)
          Replaced in 12.1.3.0.0 by ReadOnlyMetadataResourceProvider.getMetadataResources(ParsingConfig) 
oracle.adf.controller.config.ControllerConfig.getPhaseListeners()
           
oracle.adf.controller.ViewPortContext.setSavePointTimeToLive(long)
          use SavePointManager.setSavePointTimeToLive(long) 
 

Deprecated Constructors
oracle.adf.controller.TaskFlowId(String)
          use the TaskFlowId.parse(String) method instead.
